items.sentence: People who say that's how it's always been irritate me.
It's not right to talk about people behind their backs.
It's a great honor to have had the king visit our city.
Friends help each other. Just let me know what's wrong.
I'm begging you, could you stop treating me like a pet?
I think she'll be able to answer the phone around 4:00.
I'm afraid that I might get lost if I don't have a map.
I wonder whether or not Tom wants to buy that for Mary.
Tom fell asleep in class and began snoring very loudly.
Just over 30% of the people that were there were women.
